website_summaries.verdict: The Asus VivoTab Smart ME400C is aimed at the budget shopper who wants a full Windows 8 slate tablet, but it won't replace your laptop.
cons: Limited port selection requires adapters for usability
Accessories, like cover and keyboard, not yet available

customer_reviews.title: Best Combination of Price & Performance
customer_reviews.text: The ViviTab Smart is a bargain in terms of Windows 8 tablets, yet in spite of it's atom processor, it has the horsepower to perform all of the tasks of my daily computing needs (internet, word processing, spreadsheet). It is lightweight, has a bright display, and the ability to add an micro SD card for additional storage is a big plus. In addition, the battery life is much longer than the tablets with the core i5 processors. Since it has 32 bit architecture it can run my older programs that will not run on the new 64 bit machines. In summary, I am very satisfied and would definitely recommend this tablet to the average user.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The only issue with this tablet is that this specific one was made for the European market. The main instructions came in Italian and the charger also came with an option for the 'Old World' style outlet plug. The only other languages available were English, French, and a few other Slavic languages. No option for Spanish? I guess there's an app for that.. So we'll see. Working good so far. I like the fact that it takes the new XC type of micro SD card. That makes for quicker access to info. Just getting used to the windows version. Like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik L.

customer_reviews.title: great value and functionality for a tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This Win8 32 bit tablet with Office 2013 is equipped with Intel Atom Dual core CPU and 2 GB RAM / 64 GB SDD. It has a precise good quality build, but it's not as nicely made as an ipad. It is also slower to launch an app, but once loaded, multitasking is a breeze! Being a full-fledged Win8, not RT, it can do anything a normal PC can which means total flexibility. Battery holds about 3 days of regular use and charges fast. Sites like dhgate offer nice options to get a keyboard/case for this tablet for about 30 $. Overall I'm content and satisfied with this tablet which became an upgrade from ipad 1 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Asus VioTab 64GB Excellent Windows 8 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Asus Vivo Tab smart 64 gig for almost a month now, and it has proven to be quite functional. It never over heats, and this is very important to me. It has windows 8 as does my desktop computer, and they work very well together. I created a home-group, and can now share everything including the desktop's dvd drive. Finally I added a 64 gig micro SD card and now have twice the space. I am not a gamer so I don't know how well it would hold up under gaming conditions. It plays videos and music effortlessly, and the battery last most of the day if in constant use.
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is just lovely. Love the size and how light it is. This has so many more features than the iPad like the SSD card and with Windows 8, it performs great. The battery life is about 8 hours with normal use. Recharging is relatively quick. Do wish it had a longer recharging cord. The price is definitely affordable, especially for what you get. Headphone sound is definitely much better than the sound from the tablet's speakers. But, that is not a big factor for me since I use headphones most of the time anyway. Do go for the Bluetooth keyboard and mouse especially for set ups.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B.

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great form factor, light weight, very descent performance. Cons: Asus Live Update software: keeps telling me that 2 updates are available, even though I have installed them and rebooted multiple times. No way to verify if I have actually installed the updates. The Windows button (on the bottom edge of the screen) has stopped working for me a few times. A hard reset fixed that. Eats too much battery in sleep. Switching to airplane mode helps a bit. But I really recommend to fully shut down when you are not using it, if you want to save the battery: it boots up very quickly (under 30 sec).
customer_reviews.author: bbzippo

customer_reviews.title: Wast of money.
customer_reviews.text: Windows * sucked and after a while and the battery life is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Now it works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last May, and was very disappointed. The Mail client did not synchronize, the news client did not work, touch control of browsers in desktop mode was flaky. I just upgraded the operating system to Windows 8.1. It now works as it should. This is now an excellent tablet, with the added benefit of allowing use of all older desktop Windows programs. With a bluetooth mouse and keyboard, I can easily do efficient word processing. I am no longer disappointed. However, you must upgrade to the latest version of Windows.
customer_reviews.author: Avy S.

customer_reviews.title: Choose something else!
customer_reviews.text: This been nothing but trouble from day one! Don't buy this! When we got it there was some sort of static on the display screen but went away after a while. After that it started to freeze up so I would have to shut off by holding down the power button, I would also have to constantly restart because the speakers would start to sound electronic like a robot! Now the speakers are so soft you have to put it next to your ear to figure out if it's on. Total waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Electronic Purchase I've Made Yet
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this tablet to those seeking a laptop replacement! It is light and very portable and offers the full Windows 8 Operating System! That means you are not limited to the Windows app store! it is the best tablet on the market in my belief! Better than the iPad because this tablet allows you to access the full Microsoft office and any and all desktop apps! Better than Samsung for the same reason! Better than the Windows Surface because it's battery lasts longer! It beats out all of the tablets in price and value!
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is great, you can sync it with your laptop and it works perfect, I use it a lot for work and its great, I used the 30 day trial for office and then installed it and I couldn't be happier. What I didnt like is that there is not a lot of apps, or not as good as in the apple store, I hope that gets better with time but for now that is the only downside on the tablet. I would definetly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco M.

customer_reviews.title: Crashed exactly one year after the manufacturing date. After ...
customer_reviews.text: Crashed exactly one year after the manufacturing date. After sending to ASUS ($71) got a notice the memory board needed to be replaced ($289). In less than one week they sent it back with a notice that they tried to contact me several times by e-mail and phone. None of which is true. Not only are ASUS products cheap for a reason, their service is hostile.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Albatross

customer_reviews.title: Nice and inexpensive, poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tablet for Windows 8. Lightweight and portable are key factors, the screen response and performance are equally as good. The only gripe I have with this is that the battery life is pretty poor. For example, fully charged, after a 2 1/2 hour flight of just playing games, the battery is down to 48%. If I watch a movie, the battery will be down to around 20%.
customer_reviews.author: FigmentReality

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Product died a few months after the purchase, got a another replacement and died too with the exact same issues on the screen. I cannot recommend this model at all, I have been using Asus products for years but this specific model is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Asus tablet. Granted, I am no technophile and pretty easy to please when it comes to computing; however, I love the ease of use. I have had trouble with the touchscreen being non-responsive when in Google Chrome, however the problem is alleviated when I use the keyboard in this application. Beyond that, while Window 8 has some glitches, I am overall very happy with my purchase, and the tablet itself works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: soc.grrrl

customer_reviews.title: I think I basically got all the same bang for the buck as I would have had I paid $500 more and got a Surface 8
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; also bought the keyboard which took awhile to figure out how to use, but is slim enough to store with the tablet and not need any more room or really notice it is there. Every once in awhile I have problems with the touch screen, but basically I would recommend this tablet AND buy it again. My brother has the ACER version with the keyboard with battery pack and I think the keyboard/battery pack just makes it too heavy - might as well have a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carriker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a small perfect 10" companion. Great for web browsing, mails, chatting, watching movies, music, Skype, minor office presentation and more. ALERT, this unit does freeze up at times, hopefully a patch will fix this. All in all, great buy, very much contented.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I received the tablet a day early on March 6th. I first noticed that the tablet had a great build quality but still felt very lite. I turned it on and it had a ton of updates! After an hour and a half of updates (Windows 8, Windows Store Apps, and Asus bios and drivers) it was a beautifully performing computer. I love it. It is fast enough for everything I do, like surfing the web, banking, email, streaming movies and light gaming. Oh, yeah and shopping on Amazon! Before the Asus Vivotab Smart I had an Android tablet and an iPad, this blows them away! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Adams

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this product with the exception of one flaw: the sound is almost nonexistent. At full volume I have to turn the tablet over on its back and put it up to my ear to understand anything being said. Even then the volume is weak. I would have assumed the product was defective if I hadn't read other reviews referring to the same problem. I find this ironic that the problem exists while at the same time the company is praising its state-of-the-art sound technology. The tablet is still usable with a set of headphones. I have a Bose headphone, and with this work-around the sound is terrific. Terry A. French frenchterry@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: mextex

customer_reviews.title: dont buy asus tablet!!!!walk away
customer_reviews.text: I dont normaly write reveiws but for this i will. I bought this tablet for $500 about a year and a half ago. The tablet stopped working and would not turn o, So i reached out to asus support and mailed it in. it was no longer under warrenty and they said the motherboard was no good.They wanted $180 to fix it. so dont think i will be buying another asus product again as i barlly used this tablet and the motherboard went.asus will never get my money again.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't think you want to run something like Office suite
customer_reviews.text: After using it for almost two years, it is still ok but running slowly sometime. If you just need a lightweight windows tablet and only use web browser most of time, it is ok. Don't think you want to run something like Office suite.
customer_reviews.author: Hsinan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet as its big enough to play games in Yahoo game room, yet small enough to fit in my purse. The touch screen works when I am away from home. At home I do prefer using my USB wireless mouse with one of the EEEkit plugs attached. I bought this neat bundle on Amazon also. All in all very pleased!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LouM

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this tablet it does everything my computer does and even more! I haven't had any problems since I received it and I updated everything as soon as I got it and its so fast! I definitely recommend this product to anyone else and the fact that this tablet can be charged with a micro usb cord is awesome! :)
customer_reviews.author: Omar M.

customer_reviews.title: it couldn't be better
customer_reviews.text: I used ipad 2 and a couple of android tablets for killing time and now my wife and children own those. Finally I got this for my business and work last March so far I am fully satisfied with performance and product quality. Poor windows 8 app store compared to App store and google player doesn't matter with me because huge amount of softwares totally compensate for that weakness. This is the fourth Asus product for me and I don't have any qulity issues for Asus product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all I am not satisfied with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it will work and sometimes it will not work at all. It's so slow. The color seems to be ok. I get to look at it for long periods of time when it is changing pages. Over all I am not satisfied with this tablet.I was looking so forward to having my first tablet. I should have known it was going to be a big disappointment, but thank you for asking. Believe me, I wished I did have a better review to write for you, but this is as nice as I can be.
customer_reviews.author: kita falleur

customer_reviews.title: trash!!! TOO MANY MANUFACTURING DEFECTS!
customer_reviews.text: OREDED THIS TABLET, HAD TO SEND BACK ONCE FOR A TOUCHCSCREEN ERROR, RECIEVED A NEW ONE IT WORKED A BIT LONGER THEN THE SCREEN BACKLIGHT WENT OUT, NICE TABLET, NEEDS TO GO BACK TO THE DRAWING BOARD, NEEDS TO BE FLAWLESS, LIKE IPAD, SORRY!
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Have had this about six months, and having seen this as low as $350 (including a full MS Office Suite), it's really a great deal. Great cloud integration with Skydrive, and runs software like QuickBooks and TurboTax without a hitch. Battery life is excellent, and it's great for business travel. Ipads are shiny pretty little things, but I haven't yet figured out how to file a tax return or print financial statements with one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mcnear

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR SELLERS WILL BUY ANOTHER ONE VERY SOON A+++++
customer_reviews.text: FANTASITC DEAL WILL BUY ANOTHER ONE I ALREADY CRACKED THE LCD ON THIS AND ASUS WANTS MORE THAN I PAID FOR THE WHOLE TABLET LOL THANKS GUYS LT.DCG II
customer_reviews.author: DIAMONDAVEMIAMI

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. Only dislikes I have is the one speaker. Sound is fine but could be better. I was apprehensive with the atom processor but find it adequate in this product. Love the micro flash.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bolton

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect tablet. I was looking for one with full Windows 8, not RT. Also one that didn't cost a small fortune. This tablet had both!! Very easy to use and so much better than the Surface because it has full Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: P. Troutman

customer_reviews.title: very solid!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product about 6 months ago, and its still working perfectly.Camera,battery life is very good.Good for folks who want the windows experience on the go.I easily use my usb flash to transfer and copy stuffs even though it has a lot of means to transfer like bluetooth and nfc. its light and portable,nice product.i recommend it
customer_reviews.author: fayaman

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet/laptop
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, it has replaced my laptop. The weight is great and Works just as I wanted, I can run any Excel, Word, PPT, etc software with no trouble! It has never crashed and the keyboard is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nando y alejo

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tablet for a very good price. It is very responsive, nice crisp screen, light-weight, expandable memory, non-RT and good battery life. No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quigley

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: excellent all over it has worked great since start, except the charge cord is garbage. I have several like this so it did not stop me. I am slowly transitioning all of my activities to this tablet. best for the money that I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blais

customer_reviews.title: for windows fanboys
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful tablet runs with full desktop os meaning u can install any windows apps on this... Pros: >thin and light >good for browsing and watching HD movies >Nice IPS display >in built GPS >decent battery life (5+ hours) >nice front facing camera >excellent built quality and good after sale service by Asus.. Cons: No keyboard accessory with built in battery No active touch stylus option Poor speaker volume Only one micro usb port for charging as well as connecting USB devices... if you want to use mouse thru OTG, then u can't charge the device 8MP camera takes only 2MP image in wide aspect ratio... Not as snappy as iOS devices.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual seeker

customer_reviews.title: Nice..
customer_reviews.text: The look is beautiful amid it works ok , not like a regular size PC but it still do its job. There are.some software that don't run well and it got freeze. But I just got it a few days ago, let way and see how it developed.
customer_reviews.author: fernando lanza

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The feel of this tablet is solid. Windows 8.1 allows me to integrate well with my PC at work. This is everything I need and want in a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: asmith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted at half the price.
customer_reviews.text: I researched the different brands and wanted the size and features of the "I" brand, but discovered this one with 64G and expandable at less than half the price. And it has a flash drive. The screen is terrific, too. I love the WIN8 system. I'm spoiled now!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn's fancies

customer_reviews.title: ASUS Tablet is a great product from Amazon, fun to learn Windows 8.
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoy1ng the ASUS Tablet and learning Microsoft Windows 8. I did get the book Windows 8 for Dummies, from Amazon to help me along with my learning. All said and done. The ASUS Tablet is great and using Windows 8 is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hanzich

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty. The screen sometimes is unresponsive. The speaker BARELY works...it's actually really suprisingly awful...my phone from 2002 has a better speaker in it. Once you plug it in to charge, you have to watch until the little LED light turns to white and unplug it or you will over-charge this tablet...no...it doesn't come with over-charge protection which is craaaaaazzzzy in this day in age. Sooo it takes forever to charge, but no plugging it in when you go to bed because you might just over-charge this. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Robby M

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works.
customer_reviews.text: When used with the keyboard, it is pretty much what a uni-student would need. A light device that can perform word processing and access the internet via Windows. HOWEVER, when left on sleep mode for a long time, the screen likes to stop working. No fix was found. The only solution would be to force shutdown and restart, hoping you can auto-recover whatever you lost.
customer_reviews.author: plat

customer_reviews.title: ASUS VIVO Smart Tab
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. Does everything I want it to do without having a laptop. Easy to operate. Like the bigger screen for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: great tab and a great value. Cant go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.author: David Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: No Charger!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as planned. Was the tablet suppose to come with a wall charger? It did not!
customer_reviews.author: JRH

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: works well but returned it because it was not as zippy as i was hoping. going to try my hands with the surface pro.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: tablet
customer_reviews.text: my wife accidently broke need repaired can you help me? hope to hear from you soon have a great day thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Value. Cheaper than an Ipad. Great functionality - can run all my windows apps plus native tablet mode. Feels easy on the hand - balanced and even weight. I only wish they offered a 128 GB model.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It nice and all, but the touch screen just isn't sensitive enough for me to love.
customer_reviews.author: Aww Yeaaa

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: I say not bad for reasons:1) it is light, smoothly, and easy to deal with.2) I love its battery, it really works up to 9 h. However: 1)the charger wire is too short. 2)Win 8 has no very good store nor than good apps. 3) its sound must be rise up.
customer_reviews.author: amani

customer_reviews.title: great product great value
customer_reviews.text: had this tablet for half a year now and have not yet had any issues, solid construction that feels lightweight yet sturdy. I use it mainly for work right now and it suits that purpose perfectly. I do wish it had more ram but the 2 gigs it comes with are more than sufficient for any normal use scenario. all in all great product for a great price, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: aw91

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This didn't even last me a year. just stopped working. even after having it repaired once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Tablet, very light, fast, and long time battery. I'm starting to like more windows 8. Hope they improve the Store. A good inversion on this one
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hated the keyboard but loved this tablet. I have 5 computer games installed on it and it still works great whereas my laptop can't handle it. Battery life is great. I have put this tablet through a lot and it still works like new. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: amk

customer_reviews.title: Happy  College Student
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this tablet. Originally, we order the wrong tablet, Amazon assisted us with the return and promptly mailed out the desired product!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I got this tablet as an experiment to test this form factor with our medical office electronic record. Networking worked well logging into our enterprise network. We use VMware to access our system from home, office and hospital. All is working well. Our other "tablet" computers by Motion computing have about 2 hour battery life. This tablet runs all day and more on one charge. The display is very clear. It runs our applications very smoothly. No real problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson R

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchase this...
customer_reviews.text: A must for everyone.... This is a very nice tablet. Windows 8 is really hard to get use to, but the tablet is very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a tablet with Windows 8 so that I could have all the functionality of a desktop/laptop while I am traveling. This doesn't have everything the Surface has, but is significantly cheaper and does everything i need it to do. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: The ASUS Viva Tap Smart ME400C-C1-BK 10.1-Inch 64GB Tablet was Very good as expected. The ASUS Viva Tap Smart ME400C-C1-BK 10.1-Inch 64GB Tablet was Very good as expected. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Hani Abdullah AL-Garmoushi

customer_reviews.title: A tablet at a great value.
customer_reviews.text: The Tablet is remarkably different from a Android tablet certainly characteristics are excellent with Windows 8, which makes the tablet a recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: lincar27

customer_reviews.title: overall correct but might have consider other alternatives first
customer_reviews.text: Con: Limited variety of (free) apps, tablet froze (even from light usage) frequently which force me to force shut down, the system reboot itself a few times because it suddenly encounter a problem... GPS is not integrated which in the specs were supposed to be (according to eee.asus.com), supposedly 64Gb but because of the operator/processor and its component only half of that space is left Pro: 8megapicxel cam, window8, the price definitely, micro SD card slot, and so on. Verdict: overall it is a great product, and for that price it is definitely worth it. ** take into consideration the brokerage fee, might be an influential factor on decision**
customer_reviews.author: A.NG

customer_reviews.title: The next big thing.
customer_reviews.text: It has all the performance of a pc but it is a tablet. The battery life is great. It is lot better than apple
customer_reviews.author: Salim, M

customer_reviews.title: FREEZES CONSTANTLY
customer_reviews.text: The table always freezes, which then causes any saved work to be deleted. I might as well revert back to paper and pen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Sorry tablet
customer_reviews.text: used tablet is sorry piece of $@!%, keeps blacking out then keeps back and fourth when working with it then it works good when it wants.
customer_reviews.author: gmangonzales

customer_reviews.title: The touch screen sucks
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works fine, powerful cpu compare with other tablet. Cons: You realy need OTG cable for it since is dose not have USB port The touch screen exprience is very frustraiting. For example if you wanna close some app, you need slide your finger from top of the screen to the bottom, which is almost impossible to do sometimes since the trail shows my input was a series of discontinuous dots! Maybe its the screen, or the windows 8, I don`t know.
customer_reviews.author: XZ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my laptop for 80% of work and easier to carry! Light, battery is good, fast, Windows 8 takes a little to get used to, but it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Khris Ramella

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good tablet. BUT wireless speed is limited to 65mbps. This is very disappointing, copying files from pc to tablet takes longer than copying to a usb flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: arived on time,protected,just as i saw in amazona,very good it is a good choice, of course,the price is also good
customer_reviews.author: antonio jose de souza cypriano neves

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great. I have had it for a couple of months now and no problems, It is a great bedside computer or for on the go...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love having windows 8 on tablet and loading desktop programs on tablet. I do wish that more apps were available, but it will come with time. Also wish micro usb was full size usb port.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price & product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price & product, oh and of course very satisfied with this awesome product, yes sir I'm glad I purchased this here.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Perlasca

customer_reviews.title: Best Window 8 tablet so far....
customer_reviews.text: Very fast tablet. Very light and nice looking tablet. It is the cheapest one on the market and it is the best one. I have tried Acer W510 and Samsung Ativ 500T. None compare with ASUS VivoTab and those tablets cost $200 more.
customer_reviews.author: Audri

customer_reviews.title: slow processor
customer_reviews.text: The processor is a bit slow. Which made some programs that i am use to running on my pc in a few seconds take a lot longer
customer_reviews.author: Allena Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts when I bought this product, however, iy has had an excellent performance. I had a few bumps in the beginning, because for both windows update software asus and of the process was quite tedious. Then I had to wait a couple of days to activate the license of windows, and even more so to sync my accounts to mail, games, calendar, etc.. But I'm really happy with the portability, how well it performs the functions of different applications. Windows 8 really works well on touch screens, this is the future, and while the tablet has its restrictions, fully meets everything it promises.
customer_reviews.author: FranzCTL

customer_reviews.title: A teaser micro usb port bad.
customer_reviews.text: I got it out of the box and was happy it was half charged, I was so excited I went right to work. I am new to windows 8 and was just getting a few apps setup when it told me to plug in. That was all she wrote micro port was bad could not plug in battery charger. I think the next one I buy will have a full size USB port. Amazon was super to work with.
customer_reviews.author: txpressmen

customer_reviews.title: My Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really this tablet has met and surpassed my expectations, I like it a lot. No hangups everything is running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: djlove

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Works great does everything i need it to plays video very fast without any problems whatsoever 5 out 0f 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Major

customer_reviews.title: Asus Vivotab smart review
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid tablet. Once the bios, the drivers and windows are up to date, it's very stable. I had no trouble updating the device. However, if you have trouble, you should search online for the drivers. Members of some forum have collected all the necessary drivers so that you can download and update your device manually. This is a great tablet, so don't let the driver updating problem hold you back from enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a toy, but can be used in work in emergency. I found it little slow when reading PDF, but other than that, it is a nice tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Shu Hiranuma

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  Piece of junk. Will not refund!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Amazon (Galactics). It started flickering off and on and I sent it to ASUS for repair. It cost $27.00 to send it to them for repair. It still flickers. Galactics refuses to refund my money and ASUS says they do not refund any purchase that is not directly from them. This was a very expensive item. I feel betrayed and I want a refund. I will do everything I can to publicize these two companies in a negative light. Don't buy from ASUS or GALACTICS!
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Asus Vivo Tab Smart
customer_reviews.text: I love the ASUS Vivo Tab Smart ME400 ME400C. Is functional and very friendly to use and I love the full Windows 8 mode.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Orengo

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It does most everything I wanted it for, battery life is okay but not fantastic. I'm not crazy about windo8
customer_reviews.author: Dale R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set us, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Still not a fan of windows 8, but this was easy to configure, easy to get all I wanted up and running
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good overall but
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use, tablet just "died" No response for any of buttons Repaired under warranty I Like the weight and dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: ... to a technician they said windows 8 isn't the best fit for thi tablet
customer_reviews.text: It keeps freezing or I'm not able to select and type I spoke to a technician they said windows 8 isn't the best fit for this tablet does anyone else have this issue? I still have it
customer_reviews.author: Babyt27

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Win 8 tablet
customer_reviews.text: Had the IPad, had the Android tablet, finally happy as I can go from PC to Tablet mode, so much more one can do like installing programs, etc. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nali 007

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Tablet works well, Battery life is fair with average use you will get about 8 hours. BUT THE SPEAKER IS THE WORST full volume but you can not hear TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.author: Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice build on this tablet, very responsive and the touch is smooth and fluid. Asus I believe has brought us a solid windows 8 tablet to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it. Returned it. Like Windows7 laptop better. More control over programs.
customer_reviews.author: eagle2

customer_reviews.title: it turned on once for all of 5 minutes so ...
customer_reviews.text: it turned on once for all of 5 minutes so crazy I've had it, unfortunately 1 start is the lowest you can give.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It was decent, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The device was nice and stable, until I tried to do anything graphical with it, even play old games (and these are GoG games that run on other Win 8 machines). The machine would just refuse to run them. I ended up returning the device.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher James

customer_reviews.title: A 5 Starr Energy Corporation
customer_reviews.text: It has been everything that I expected from my research on the different tablets that I reviewed in this size range.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Starr

customer_reviews.title: Asus Tablet
customer_reviews.text: So far not real sure I LOVE it BUT it is on it's way to be repaired ALREADY!! Number 1 ..it charges when it wants to . When it doesn't it will not charge over 80% no matter how long you try Number 2 the Microsd slot is to big. If your not REALLY careful you can lose it inside the tablet! Will up day when I get it back from the company... :(
customer_reviews.author: tdbear45

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a true windows machine. I have only had the ME400 for a few days but the thing is great. Battery is long lasting and fast charging. The wifi was spot on, using Windows 8 is fine, and set up is fun!. I may have to get the Office down load to use the pad rather then take notebook with me on trips, but it is fairly reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: David Kenzler

customer_reviews.title: A work in Progress
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work - 1. Facebook 2. Facebook messenger 3. Chrome. 4. A few more. No Apps for a lot of things on the Windows App store
customer_reviews.author: HUMERA S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it, not problem so far. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this - a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of problems since we got it last February. Camera works on & off, internet erratic, freezes up. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther Rockman

customer_reviews.title: not happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I recieved it and it already had problems. I have to send it to get it fixed. Very dissatisfied that i paid for new and got half broken
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice
customer_reviews.text: A tablet of low quality, has serious flaws, no lights, parts failures, is really shoddy and W8 is a bad election for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Munar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and can run Droid on it also from BidsWOW.com
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this amazing Tab. It is beautiful, thin and works wonderfully. Charge it first. The sellers is the best in the world. Truly. It arrived immediately. I loved windows 8 but was missing droid. I downloaded Droid that runs on windows from BidsWOW.com Worked amazingly well. Highly Recommend it! Five stars for the seller and the Tab. It's so cool to have Windows 8 and now all my Droid apps, too.
customer_reviews.author: BidsWOW

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your momey
customer_reviews.text: Windows 8 still needs a lot of work. And this Asus vivotab needs even more. I would wait until the tables with the the I5, and I7 come down in price. Because trust me you will not be happy with this one. I tried to return it and got zero respond from tiger direct.
customer_reviews.author: jbdvill

product_meta.title: ASUS ME400 Win8 Tablet [OLD VERION]
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackME400C-C1-BK, Black, 10.1-Inch WXGA IPS Touch Panel, Intel Atom Z2760, 2GB DDR2, PowerVR SGX545, 64GB Flash, Win 8, 802.11BGN, 2MP & 8MP, Bluetooth 4.0, Polymer 25W/h (8.5 Hours), G-Sensor for LCD auto-orientation, Ambient Light Sensor, E-compass sensor, Gyroscope, 1 Year North America Warranty

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
ASUS AND YOU
INCREDIBLE TOGETHER
ASUS VivoTab Smart ME400C tablet is ultra- fast, highly responsive and elegantly designed to achieve highest productivity for both business and pleasure. With its incredibly thin and lightweight measuring at 0.4" thin and weight 1.3lbs, your world connects through a simple touch of the VivoTab Smart.

ASUS VivoTab, where Innovative Design meets Incredible Performance



ABOUT ASUS
TRIED AND TESTED FOR QUALITY
ASUS is a global technology leader who focuses on the mastery of innovation and design perfection. Today, it is the world's #1 manufacturer of motherboards and is one of world's top PC brands. With customers' need in the forefront, ASUS embodies the passion to create products that truly enhance the computing experience. Not only does design matter, ASUS products are also strictly quality tested to surpass industry standards, surviving multiple drop tests, hinge tests cycles and LCD pressure tests to name a few, ensuring that every ASUS product you buy will be one of your best investments.

RELIABILITY MATTERS
ASUS PCs finish near or at the top of the industry's reliability rankings survey after survey3. Known for their unmatched reliability, ASUS products clearly offers you peace of mind and quality you can trust. Using only premium materials, ASUS aims to break the industry mold and deliver a product that is truly incredible.

VIVOTAB SMART INCREDIBLE FEATURES
 * Extremely thin at 0.4" and lightweight of only 1.3lbs.
 * 10.1" WXGA IPS Panel with 178 ° ultra-wide viewing angle - capacitive touch panel and multi-touch functionality.
 * 64GB flash storage with 2GB of DDR2 system memory for smooth computing.
 * Crystal clear 8MP Rear Camera with LED Flash, back-illuminated CMOS sensor, and 2MP Front Camera with LED Indicator for high quality video chatting.
 * ASUS SonicMaster Technology delivers more powerful sounds and richer bass to provide the best audio experience.
 * Up to 8.5 hours battery life for all-day computing1
 * Includes 32GB of ASUS WebStorage2 for 36 months
 * NFC ready for convenient and intuitive peer to peer data and content sharing
 * Optional TranSleeve Keyboard Vivo – an innovative accessory that acts as a cover, keyboard, and sleeve (sold separately).
 * Available in two colors – Black and White

SPECIFICATIONS
 * Color: Black – (Model: ME400C-C1-BK)
   White – (Model: ME400C-C1-WH)
 * Processor: Intel Atom Z2760 (1.8 Burst)
 * Operating System: Windows 8
 * System memory: 2GB DDR2
 * Storage: 64GB Flash + 32GB free for 36 months
 * Display: 10.1" WXGA IPS Touch Panel with 350 nits brightness 1366*768
 * Video Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator, 533MHz
 * Video Camera: Rear 8MP Auto-focus w/LED Flash, F/2.2 Aperture, 1080p video recording, front 2MP for video conferencing
 * Wireless: 802.11bgn (Single band)
 * Bluetooth: 4.0
 * Card Reader: 1x Micro SD
 * Interface: 2-in-1 Audio Jack (Head Phone / Mic-in) / 1 x Micro HDMI / 1 x Micro SD Card Reader (support SDXC compatible card) / 1 x Internal Microphone /Speaker (SonicMaster) / 1 x Micro USB
 * Audio: Hi-Definition Audio Codec / Built-in quality speakers / Mic
 * Weight (lb): 1.3
 * Dimension (in): 10.5" x 6.7" x .4"
 * AC Adapter: Output: 15W / 18 W / Input:100-240V AC, 50/60Hz universal 
 * AC Adapter: 8.5 hours
 * GPS: Supported
 * Sensor: G-Sensor, Light Sensor, Gyroscope, E-compass, NFC

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * ASUS VivoTab Smart Tablet
 * Adapter & Power Plug
 * Owner's Manual
 * Warranty Card
 * Cleaning Cloth


 

1Actual battery life varies with usage. Operation lifetime subjects to product model, normal usage conditions, and configurations. 

2Web storage size and validity varies. Please check with your authorized retailer or logon to https://www.asuswebstorage.com/ for more details
